chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), bijective f -> invertible f

Premises:
Inductive invertible (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) : Prop := intro_invertible : forall g : Y -> X, (forall x : X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : Y, f (g y) = y) -> invertible f Arguments invertible {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments intro_invertible {X Y}%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
bijective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => injective f /\ surjective f : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments bijective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
invertible_sind : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (P : SProp), (forall g : Y -> X, (forall x : X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : Y, f (g y) = y) -> P) -> invertible f -> P
invertible_ind : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (P : Prop), (forall g : Y -> X, (forall x : X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : Y, f (g y) = y) -> P) -> invertible f -> P
intro_invertible : forall (f : ?X -> ?Y) (g : ?Y -> ?X), (forall x : ?X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : ?Y, f (g y) = y) -> invertible f where ?X : [ |- Type] ?Y : [ |- Type]
function_inverse : forall f : ?X -> ?Y, invertible f -> {g : ?Y -> ?X | (forall x : ?X, g (f x) = x) /\ (forall y : ?Y, f (g y) = y)} where ?X : [ |- Type] ?Y : [ |- Type]
unique_inverse : forall f : ?X -> ?Y, invertible f -> exists ! g : ?Y -> ?X, (forall x : ?X, g (f x) = x) /\ (forall y : ?Y, f (g y) = y) where ?X : [ |- Type] ?Y : [ |- Type]
PeanoNat.Nat.recursion_succ : forall (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation ?A) (a : ?A) (f : nat -> ?A -> ?A), Aeq a a -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful Aeq Aeq)) f -> forall n : nat, Aeq (PeanoNat.Nat.recursion a f (S n)) (f n (PeanoNat.Nat.recursion a f n)) where ?A : [ |- Type]
functional_extensionality_dep : forall f g : forall x : ?A, ?B x, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- ?A -> Type]
functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on = fun A B : Type => forall R : A -> B -> Prop, inhabited B -> exists f : A -> B, forall x : A, (exists y : B, R x y) -> R x (f x) : Type -> Type -> Prop Arguments ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on (_ _)%type_scope
ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on = fun A B : Type => forall R : A -> B -> Prop, (forall x : A, exists y : B, R x y) -> exists f : A -> B, forall x : A, R x (f x) : Type -> Type -> Prop Arguments ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on (_ _)%type_scope
Inductive Conditionally_complete (U : Type) (D : PO U) : Prop := Definition_of_Conditionally_complete : (forall X : Ensemble U, Included U X (Carrier_of U D) -> (exists maj : U, Upper_Bound U D X maj) -> exists bsup : U, Lub U D X bsup) -> Conditionally_complete U D Arguments Conditionally_complete _%type_scope Arguments Definition_of_Conditionally_complete _%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Tauto.collect_annot = fun TA TX AA AF : Type => fix collect_annot (f : Tauto.GFormula) : list AA := match f with | Tauto.A _ a => (a :: nil)%list | Tauto.N f0 => collect_annot f0 | Tauto.Cj f1 f2 | Tauto.D f1 f2 | Tauto.I f1 _ f2 => (collect_annot f1 ++ collect_annot f2)%list | _ => nil end : forall TA TX AA AF : Type, Tauto.GFormula -> list AA Arguments Tauto.collect_annot {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
InitialRing.R_setoid5_Transitive : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req -> RelationClasses.Transitive req
EnvRing.mkPinj_ok : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> forall (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (j : BinNums.positive) (l : Env.Env R) (P : EnvRing.Pol C), req (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l (EnvRing.mkPinj j P)) (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi (Env.jump j l) P)
Ring_theory.ARmul_1_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul x rI) x
Ring_theory.ARadd_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd x rO) x
EnvRing.Pphi0 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall l : Env.Env R, req (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l (EnvRing.P0 cO)) rO
Ring_theory.morph_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall x y : C, req (phi (cadd x y)) (radd (phi x) (phi y))
Ring_theory.morph_mul : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> forall x y : C, req (phi (cmul x y)) (rmul (phi x) (phi y))
EnvRing.Pol_ind : forall (C : Type) (P : EnvRing.Pol C -> Prop), (forall c : C, P (EnvRing.Pc c)) -> (forall (p : BinNums.positive) (p0 : EnvRing.Pol C), P p0 -> P (EnvRing.Pinj p p0)) -> (forall p : EnvRing.Pol C, P p -> forall (p0 : BinNums.positive) (p1 : EnvRing.Pol C), P p1 -> P (EnvRing.PX p p0 p1)) -> forall p : EnvRing.Pol C, P p
Field_theory.AFdiv_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))
RingMicromega.rtimes_morph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x y : R, req x y -> forall x0 y0 : R, req x0 y0 -> req (rtimes x x0) (rtimes y y0)
OrderedRing.SORplus_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2)
ChoiceFacts.SmallDrinker'sParadox = forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), inhabited A -> exists x : A, (exists x0 : A, P x0) -> P x : Prop
EnvRing.radd_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) radd
EnvRing.rmul_ext_Proper : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) rmul
Ring_theory.morph1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), Ring_theory.ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi -> req (phi cI) rI
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
constructive_definite_description : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (exists ! x : A, P x) -> {x : A | P x}
Ring_theory.ARmul_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul x y) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
Ring_theory.ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
Ring_theory.ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
EnvRing.PmulC_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (c : C) (P : EnvRing.Pol C) (l : Env.Env R), req (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l (EnvRing.PmulC cO cI cmul ceqb P c)) (rmul (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P) (phi c))
Ring_theory.ARdistr_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))
Ring_theory.ARmul_assoc2 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul y x) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
EnvRing.Psquare_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (P : EnvRing.Pol C) (l : Env.Env R), req (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l (EnvRing.Psquare cO cI cadd cmul ceqb P)) (rmul (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P) (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P))
EnvRing.Padd_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (P' P : EnvRing.Pol C) (l : Env.Env R), req (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l (EnvRing.Padd cO cadd ceqb P P')) (radd (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P) (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P'))
EnvRing.Pmul_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> forall (P P' : EnvRing.Pol C) (l : Env.Env R), req (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l (EnvRing.Pmul cO cI cadd cmul ceqb P P')) (rmul (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P) (EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi l P'))
Ring_theory.ARdistr_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul z (radd x y)) (radd (rmul z x) (rmul z y))
Setoid.Seq_refl : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x : A, Aeq x x

```  
intros X Y f H1. 
unfold invertible, bijective, injective, surjective.
intros [H2 H3].
constructor.
- intros y. specialize (H3 y). destruct H3 as [x Hx]. exists x. apply Hx.
- intros x. specialize (H3 (f x)). apply H3.
Qed.
```

original: intros X Y f H1. unfold invertible, bijective, injective, surjective. intros [H2 H3]. constructor. - intros y. specialize (H3 y). destruct H3 as [x Hx]. exists x. apply Hx. - intros x. specialize (H3 (f x)). apply H3.
